name: sigterm-all
summary: When stopping a dyno, send SIGTERM to all processes rather than only to the root process.

name: sumo-rankings
summary: Hilarity Sumo ranks and visualizes the scale of your app, and suggests the optimum combination of dynos and add-ons to take it to the next level.

name: user_env_compile
summary: Add user config vars to the environment during slug compilation
